Translations.Text: ning avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa mnoussa) nung trauv ke leatatradeang aoy kheunh yeang chbasa noh
pitabrakd nasa now thngai noh mcheasa robsa puokke doeng bamphot champoh ruengreav robsa puokke
a l k ri aah
tae a l k ri aah chea avei
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha a l k ri aah chea avei noh
kuchea thngai del mnoussa lok brieb dauchchea hvaung satv meambaw del haer brasechabrasaeach
haey phnom teanglay brieb dauchchea romosatv del trauv ke thveu aoy baeng
haey rie anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke thngon( khang ampeula) noh
ku ke nung sthet knong karorsanow brakabdaoy kdei penh chetd(now knong thansuokr)
haey chamnek e anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke sral ( khang ampeula) noh
tilomnow robsa ke ku nork ha vi yah( rondawnork da chrow)
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha vea chea avei noh
vea kuchea phleung nork da sen kdaw
pheap kraeutakratm nung pheap meanotropy sa mb tde ning kaunchaw cheachraen ban thveu aoy puok anak phe l ch khluon( pi karkorp brate b tde champoh a l laoh)
rhaut puok anak chaul tow knong phnaur( rhaut anak slab)
te. puok anak kngte nung doeng cheaminkhan
te. banteabmk puok anak kngte nung doeng
te. brasenbae puok anakdoeng( pi lotthophl nei kar phe l ch khluon robsa puok anak) daoy kar doeng yeang chbasaleasa noh( puok anak pitchea min thveu dauchnaoh laey)
chea karpit nasa puok anak nung kheunh nork cheu hi m cheaminkhan
banteabmk puok anak pitchea nung kheunh vea yeang chbasa nung phnek
kraoyomk puok anak nung trauv ke suor now thngai noh ampi nie k meat del trong ban bratan aoy puok anak
